Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Just in the wrong place”
Reviews.Author: BoingBoingBaggieBird
Reviews.Content: arrived late due usual awful istanbul traffic nearly hours airport told normally hour free upgrade suite fifth floor fantastic walk balcony jacuzzi loads floor space smoking didnt smell cigarettes bar restaurant completely empty thursday completely devoid atmosphere meal cooked beautifully reasonable shame drinks waitress managed forget drink customer bar restaurant id liked eat weather terrible location theres minaret near istanbul unless earplugs heavy sleeper expect woken 6am

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but in a terrible area”
Reviews.Author: Swiss_Rob
Reviews.Content: company booked hotel close office istanbul business trip accompanied wife 3 month boy enjoyed hotel wife bored hotel nice spacious modern service crib booked nice baby buffet breakfast wifi included amneties couldnt try heck pool homepage complain hotel car close ikea attached shopping nice restaurant drive 20 minutes wife walk day impossible stroller pedestrians lot traffic western pretty exposed business trips dont hotel tourist

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good experience”
Reviews.Author: Giulia_London
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights close office knowing asian braced bad experience instead nice stay extremely spacious price paid drawback view lack window colleagues window changed experience completely staff ok breakfast wasnt ones managed eatable pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice in pictures, terrible otherwise.”
Reviews.Author: AgileTraveller
